entry.title: My Frist Blog
entry.content:
Hi, my friend! Nice to meet you here!

​ I graduate from Anhui Medical University, and will go on studying for my postgraduate program! Since i look up much online information these days, i come to realize that there exist much more knowledge to learn, and much more appliances to operate proficiently. Thus, i set up my personal blog in order to record the progress i’ll make!

Thanks for interviewing! Let’s study together!

entry.title: My Plan
entry.content:
学习计划

  1. Markdown软件Typora以及相关语法
  2. EndNote20的常用操作以及引用格式
  3. 个人博客的更新维护
  4. R语言
  5. Python
  6. SAS
  7. 多元统计
  8. 线性代数
  9. …

啊，我无了~

先计划这些吧，慢慢来

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
